casebody.data:
Third Department,

January, 1937.

(January 5, 1937.) Antonio Pasquale and Another, Copartners Trading as Antonio Pasquale & Son, Plaintiffs, v. The State of New York and Harry R. Austin, Defendants. Patrick T. Coulter, Respondent. Chas. Shutrump & Sons Co., Appellant. Antonio Pasquale and Another, Copartners Trading as Antonio Pasquale & Son, Plaintiffs, Respondents, v. The State of New York, Patrick T. Coulter and Harry R. Austin, Defendants, and Chas. Shutrump & Sons Co., Appellant.

Motion to set aside decision, handed down November 18, 1936, and the order entered November 23, 1936, and to reinstate appeal, granted on condition that the cause be argued at the January order and general calendar term. Present — Hill, P. J., Rhodes, McNamee, Crapser and Bliss, JJ.
